name: mobile-services-preview
description: Mobile Services Preview gives you an opportunity to test new features a couple of weeks before their production release of Mobile Services. Mobile Services Preview is not intended as a production environment.Use Mobile Services Preview to provide mobile access to enterprise information. Key features include app content lifecycle management, push notifications and support for offline apps, app security, app monitoring and usage reporting. This includes native build apps, MDK and SAP Mobile Cards. You need this to run apps based on the SAP Business Technology Platform SDK for iOS. Get started by clicking on the Support link below.
